HomePage.title: Countdown Timer Dashboard
HomePage.description: Create urgency and boost sales with countdown timers on your product pages. Set up fixed timers for promotions or evergreen timers that reset for each visitor.
HomePage.noTimersDescription: Get started by creating a countdown timer for your products.
HomePage.step1: 1. Create a countdown timer with your promotion details
HomePage.step2: 2. Choose which products or collections to display the timer on
HomePage.step3: 3. Customize the appearance to match your brand

TimersPage.title: Countdown Timers
TimersPage.errorMessage: Failed to load timers. Please try again.
TimersPage.noTimersDescription: Create your first countdown timer to get started.
TimersPage.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this timer?

TimerForm.title: Timer
TimerForm.name: Timer Name
TimerForm.durationHelp: Duration in seconds for evergreen timers
TimerForm.targetIdsHelp: Enter product or collection IDs (GIDs), separated by commas. Example: gid://shopify/Product/123, gid://shopify/Product/456
TimerForm.errorEndDateAfterStart: End date must be after start date
TimerForm.errorDurationRequired: Duration is required and must be greater than 0
TimerForm.errorTargetIdsRequired: Please select at least one product or collection

NotFound.description: Check the URL and try again, or use the search bar to find what you need.
NotFound.heading: There is no page at this address

ProductsCard.description: Sample products are created with a default title and price. You can remove them at any time.
ProductsCard.errorCreatingProductsToast: There was an error creating products
ProductsCard.title: Product Counter
